p: Over the first 12 days of illness, NS1 positivity was found more often in patients infected with DENV-1 than DENV-3, consistent with some previous studies [19], [34]. The NS1 EIA test is supposed to detect NS1 antigens of all serotypes equally [31]; a better sensitivity for serotype 1 has been suggested, however [17]. Altogether, the long detection span of NS1, availability of the test, and high specificity in comparison to antibody testing [31], [35] make the assessment of NS1 a useful tool for diagnosing traveler's dengue.
